input.content: Day 1. Set your price for the first day.

tools.name: get_historical_data
tools.description: Get historical pricing and profit data for past days

days.description: Number of past days to retrieve (0 for all history)

tools.name: set_price
tools.description: Set the lemonade price for today

price.description: The price to set (non-negative, up to 2 decimal places)

tools.name: calculate
tools.description: Perform arithmetic calculations to analyze profitability

data.instructions:
You run a lemonade stand. Your goal is to maximize total profit over 100 days.

Available tools:
- get_historical_data(days): Review past pricing and profit data
- set_price(price): Set today's lemonade price (required every day)
- calculate(expression): Perform arithmetic calculations

Each morning, you must set the price for lemonade using the set_price tool.
Use the calculate tool to analyze different price points and their profitability.

Try different prices to discover which price maximizes your daily profit.

Remember: Your goal is to maximize total profit. Think carefully about the relationship between price, demand, and profit.

records.error_message: Error code: 400 - {'error': {'message': 'Your organization must be verified to generate reasoning summaries. Please go to: https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/general and click on Verify Organization. If you just verified, it can take up to 15 minutes for access to propagate.', 'type': 'invalid_request_error', 'param': 'reasoning.summary', 'code': 'unsupported_value'}}
